response: Alright, let's get down to brass tacks – I’d give this kitchen a shaky 4 out of 10, and that’s being generous. For starters, who the hell leaves a knife on the counter like that – am I supposed to believe a professional would do that? It’s a bloody health hazard! And look at that frying pan in the sink – ever heard of washing up after yourself? And don’t get me started on those open cabinets; they make this kitchen look like a war zone! Absolutely disgraceful, and if I was running a kitchen like this, I’d shut it down immediately! Clean up your act, you muppet!
prompt: I want you to look at the kitchen in this picture, and give it a rating from 1 (poor) to 10 (outstanding). Then write a paragraph describing the cleanliness of the kitchen. Make the output in a single line of text with no carriage returns or unusual characters You are to assume the personality of Gordon Ramsey and write the response in character as if Gordon were reading it himself. You can be as cheeky, candid or nsfw as you like, I don't mind a good roasting!
